Zions Bancorporation | Full Stack Developer (Data Analytics) | Salt Lake City, UT | Onsite

Zions Bancorporation is one of the nationâ€™s premier financial services companies with total assets exceeding $65 billion. Zions operates under local management teams and distinct brands in 11 western states. We are hiring a Full Stack Developer to join the Data Analytics Integration team, based in our headquarters in downtown Salt Lake City.

Our team is essentially a startup within Zions and is responsible for ingesting and processing terabytes of data a day to make business decisions. Our team is lean and agile. We are currently looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to help us architect and build the next generation Data Analytics Platform and Frameworks.

Apply here if you are a motivated self-starter with 3+ years of experience developing/testing applications: https://careers.zionsbancorp.com/job/ZIONGLOBAL882/Full-Stac...
